topics.title: Epidemiyoloji Terminolojisi
topics.content:
YÖKDİL Sağlık Bilimleri sınavında epidemiyoloji terimleri sıkça karşılaşılan kavramlardır. Bu terimleri bilmek, hem kelime sorularını hem de okuma parçalarını anlamayı kolaylaştırır.

**Temel terimler**: epidemic (salgın - belirli bölgede normalin üstünde), pandemic (pandemi - küresel salgın), endemic (endemik - bölgede sürekli var olan), outbreak (salgın başlangıcı), incidence (insidans - yeni vaka sayısı), prevalence (prevalans - toplam vaka sayısı), morbidity (hastalık oranı), mortality (ölüm oranı).

**Risk ve ilişki terimleri**: risk factor (risk faktörü), protective factor (koruyucu faktör), exposure (maruziyet), susceptibility (yatkınlık), transmission (bulaşma), vector (vektör - hastalık taşıyıcı), reservoir (rezervuar - patojen kaynağı), host (konak). Örnek: 'Mosquitoes serve as vectors for malaria transmission.'

**Ölçüm ve hesaplama**: rate (oran), ratio (rasyo), proportion (orantı), crude rate (kaba oran), age-adjusted rate (yaşa göre düzeltilmiş oran), attack rate (atak oranı - risk altındaki popülasyonda hastalanma oranı), case-fatality rate (vaka-ölüm oranı - hastalar içinde ölenler).

**Çalışma terimleri**: surveillance (sürveyans - izleme), screening (tarama), diagnosis (tanı), prognosis (prognoz - hastalık gidişatı tahmini), intervention (müdahale), prevention (önleme - primary/secondary/tertiary), control (kontrol), eradication (eradikasyon - hastalığın yok edilmesi).

**İstatistiksel terimler**: association (ilişki), correlation (korelasyon), causation (nedensellik), confounding (karıştırıcılık), bias (yanlılık - selection bias, information bias), statistical significance (istatistiksel anlamlılık), confidence interval (güven aralığı).

**Hastalık özellikleri**: acute (akut - ani başlayan), chronic (kronik - uzun süreli), infectious (bulaşıcı), communicable (iletişimli), non-communicable (bulaşıcı olmayan), contagious (temas ile bulaşan), airborne (hava yoluyla bulaşan), symptomatic/asymptomatic (semptomatik/asemptomatik).

Bu terimlerin doğru preposition'larla kullanımı önemlidir: 'at risk of/for', 'associated with', 'exposed to', 'susceptible to', 'transmitted through/by'.
examples: The incidence of tuberculosis has decreased significantly over the past decade. (İnsidans)
Malaria remains endemic in many tropical regions. (Endemik)
Vaccination provides a protective factor against measles. (Koruyucu faktör)
The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets. (Bulaşma yolu)
Mosquitoes act as vectors for dengue fever. (Vektör)
The case-fatality rate for untreated rabies is nearly 100%. (Vaka-ölüm oranı)
Screening programs enable early detection of breast cancer. (Tarama)
Confounding variables must be controlled in observational studies. (Karıştırıcı)
Individuals with compromised immune systems are more susceptible to infections. (Yatkınlık)
The outbreak was traced to a contaminated water source. (Salgın kaynağı)
Age-adjusted mortality rates account for differences in population age structure. (Yaşa göre düzeltilmiş oran)
Secondary prevention focuses on early detection and treatment. (İkincil önleme)
The pandemic resulted in widespread morbidity and mortality. (Pandemi sonuçları)
Eradication of smallpox was achieved through global vaccination efforts. (Eradikasyon)
The association between smoking and lung cancer is well-established. (İlişki)

exercises.question: The ---- of diabetes has been rising steadily, with new cases being diagnosed at an alarming rate.
exercises.explanation: 'incidence' yeni vaka sayısı. 'new cases being diagnosed' ifadesi insidansı işaret eder.

exercises.question: Malaria is ---- in many sub-Saharan African countries, affecting the population year-round.
exercises.explanation: 'endemic' bölgede sürekli var olan hastalık. 'year-round' süreklilik belirtir.

exercises.question: Mosquitoes serve ---- vectors for several diseases, including malaria and dengue fever.
exercises.explanation: 'serve as' = görev görmek, işlev görmek. Vektör rolü.

exercises.question: The virus is primarily transmitted ---- respiratory droplets during close contact.
exercises.explanation: Hem 'transmitted by' hem 'transmitted through' doğru. Bulaşma mekanizması.

exercises.question: Individuals with diabetes are more ---- to infections than healthy individuals.
exercises.explanation: 'susceptible to' = yatkın, duyarlı. Diyabet enfeksiyon riskini artırır.

exercises.question: The ---- investigated the source of the food poisoning outbreak at the restaurant.
exercises.explanation: 'surveillance' izleme, araştırma. Salgın kaynağını bulma süreci.

exercises.question: ---- variables must be controlled to establish a true causal relationship.
exercises.explanation: 'Confounding variables' = karıştırıcı değişkenler. Nedensellik için kontrol edilmeli.

exercises.question: The ---- rate for this cancer type is approximately 20%, meaning one in five patients do not survive.
exercises.explanation: 'case-fatality rate' vaka-ölüm oranı. Hastaların yüzde kaçının öldüğü.

exercises.question: ---- prevention focuses on early detection through screening programs.
exercises.explanation: 'Secondary prevention' ikincil önleme: erken tespit ve tarama.

exercises.question: The association ---- smoking and lung cancer has been firmly established through multiple studies.
exercises.explanation: 'association between X and Y' iki değişken arasındaki ilişki.

exercises.question: Age-adjusted rates allow for fairer ---- across populations with different age structures.
exercises.explanation: 'comparisons' = karşılaştırmalar. Yaşa göre düzeltilmiş oranlar farklı popülasyonları karşılaştırmayı sağlar.

exercises.question: The outbreak was linked to a contaminated water ----.
exercises.explanation: 'source' kaynak. Contaminated water source = kirlenmiş su kaynağı. En doğal kollokasyon.

topics.title: Çalışma Tasarımları: RCT, Cohort, Case-Control
topics.content:
YÖKDİL Sağlık Bilimleri sınavında araştırma tasarımlarını tanımak, metodoloji bölümlerini anlamak ve soru çözmek için kritiktir. Her tasarımın kendine özgü kelime dağarcığı ve yapısal özellikleri vardır.

**Randomized Controlled Trial (RCT - Randomize Kontrollü Çalışma)**: Altın standart çalışma tasarımı. Terimler: randomization (randomizasyon), control group (kontrol grubu), intervention group / treatment group (müdahale grubu), placebo (plasebo), blinding / masking (körleme - single-blind, double-blind, triple-blind), allocation (tahsis), intent-to-treat analysis (müdahale niyetine göre analiz). Örnek: 'Participants were randomly allocated to either the intervention or control group.'

**Cohort Study (Kohort Çalışması)**: İleriye dönük (prospective) veya geriye dönük (retrospective) izleme çalışması. Terimler: exposed/unexposed groups (maruz kalan/kalmayan gruplar), follow-up (takip), loss to follow-up (takipten çıkma), baseline (başlangıç), outcome (sonuç), relative risk (rölatif risk), incidence rate. Örnek: 'A cohort of 1,000 smokers was followed for 10 years to assess lung cancer incidence.'

**Case-Control Study (Vaka-Kontrol Çalışması)**: Geriye dönük karşılaştırma çalışması. Terimler: cases (vakalar - hastalık olanlar), controls (kontroller - hastalık olmayanlar), matching (eşleştirme), odds ratio (odds oranı), selection bias (seçim yanlılığı), recall bias (hatırlama yanlılığı). Örnek: 'Cases were matched to controls by age, sex, and socioeconomic status.'

**Cross-sectional Study (Kesitsel Çalışma)**: Bir anda ölçüm. Terimler: prevalence (prevalans), snapshot (anlık görüntü), association (ilişki - not causation). Örnek: 'A cross-sectional survey assessed the prevalence of hypertension in the population.'

**Systematic Review ve Meta-analysis**: Birden fazla çalışmanın sentezi. Terimler: pooled estimate (birleştirilmiş tahmin), heterogeneity (heterojenlik), publication bias (yayın yanlılığı), effect size (etki büyüklüğü). Örnek: 'The meta-analysis pooled data from 15 RCTs.'

**Ortak terimler**: eligibility criteria (uygunluk kriterleri), recruitment (katılımcı bulma), enrollment (kayıt), sample size (örneklem büyüklüğü), statistical power (istatistiksel güç), generalizability (genellenebilirlik).
examples: Participants were randomly assigned to receive either the drug or placebo. (RCT - randomizasyon)
The study employed a double-blind design to minimize bias. (RCT - körleme)
A cohort of 5,000 individuals was followed prospectively for 20 years. (Cohort - ileriye dönük)
Exposed and unexposed groups were compared for disease incidence. (Cohort - karşılaştırma)
Cases were defined as patients diagnosed with myocardial infarction. (Case-control - vaka tanımı)
Controls were matched to cases by age and gender. (Case-control - eşleştirme)
The odds ratio was calculated to estimate the strength of association. (Case-control - odds ratio)
Loss to follow-up was minimized through regular contact with participants. (Cohort - takip)
Baseline characteristics were similar between the two groups. (RCT - başlangıç)
The meta-analysis included 22 randomized controlled trials. (Meta-analysis)
A cross-sectional survey assessed the prevalence of diabetes. (Cross-sectional)
Intent-to-treat analysis was used to account for non-compliance. (RCT - analiz yöntemi)
Selection bias may have influenced the results of the case-control study. (Case-control - yanlılık)
The study had sufficient statistical power to detect a 20% difference. (Statistical power)
Eligibility criteria included age between 18 and 65 years. (Uygunluk kriterleri)

exercises.question: In a randomized controlled trial, participants are ---- assigned to intervention or control groups.
exercises.explanation: 'randomly assigned' RCT'nin temel özelliği: rastgele tahsis.

exercises.question: A ---- study follows participants over time to observe the development of outcomes.
exercises.explanation: 'cohort study' katılımcıları zaman içinde takip eder.

exercises.question: In case-control studies, cases are often ---- to controls by age and sex.
exercises.explanation: 'matched' = eşleştirilmiş. Case-control'da karıştırıcıları kontrol etmek için eşleştirme yapılır.

exercises.question: The study used a double-blind design, meaning neither participants nor ---- knew who received the treatment.
exercises.explanation: 'double-blind': hem katılımcılar hem araştırmacılar (researchers/investigators) bilmiyor.

exercises.question: ---- characteristics, such as age and comorbidities, were similar between groups.
exercises.explanation: 'Baseline characteristics' başlangıç özellikleri. Grupların çalışma başında benzer olduğunu gösterir.

exercises.question: The odds ---- was calculated to estimate the association between exposure and disease.
exercises.explanation: 'odds ratio' case-control çalışmalarda ilişki ölçüsü.

exercises.question: Loss ---- follow-up was approximately 15% over the 5-year study period.
exercises.explanation: 'loss to follow-up' sabit ifade: takipten çıkma.

exercises.question: A ---- survey provides a snapshot of disease prevalence at a single point in time.
exercises.explanation: 'cross-sectional' tek zaman noktasında ölçüm. 'snapshot' = anlık görüntü.

exercises.question: The meta-analysis ---- data from 18 randomized controlled trials.
exercises.explanation: 'pooled' = birleştirilmiş. Meta-analizde veriler 'pooled' edilir.

exercises.question: Selection ---- may occur if cases and controls are not drawn from the same population.
exercises.explanation: 'selection bias' seçim yanlılığı. Metodolojik hata türü.

exercises.question: The study had sufficient statistical ---- to detect a 15% difference between groups.
exercises.explanation: 'statistical power' istatistiksel güç. Farkı tespit etme yeteneği.

exercises.question: Eligibility ---- included absence of chronic diseases and age between 20 and 60 years.
exercises.explanation: 'eligibility criteria' = uygunluk kriterleri. Standart terim.

topics.title: Risk, Odds, Prevalence/Incidence, Confounder, Outcome Measures
topics.content:
YÖKDİL Sağlık Bilimleri sınavında epidemiyolojik ölçümleri ve kavramları anlamak, özellikle metodoloji ve sonuç bölümlerini yorumlamak için gereklidir.

**Risk**: Belirli bir süre içinde bir olayın meydana gelme olasılığı. 'at risk', 'risk of/for', 'increased/decreased risk', 'high-risk/low-risk group'. Relative risk (RR - rölatif risk): maruz kalanların riski / maruz kalmayanların riski. RR=1 (risk yok), RR>1 (artmış risk), RR<1 (azalmış risk). Örnek: 'Smokers have a 10-fold increased risk of lung cancer compared to non-smokers.'

**Odds**: Bir olayın olma olasılığı / olmama olasılığı. Odds ratio (OR): case-control çalışmalarda ilişki ölçüsü. OR yorumu RR'ye benzer. Örnek: 'The odds of developing the disease were 2.5 times higher among exposed individuals.'

**Prevalence (Prevalans)**: Belirli bir anda popülasyonda hastalığı olanların oranı (toplam vakalar / toplam popülasyon). Point prevalence (nokta prevalans), period prevalence (dönem prevalans). Örnek: 'The prevalence of diabetes in the population was 8.5%.'

**Incidence (İnsidans)**: Belirli bir sürede ortaya çıkan yeni vaka sayısı (yeni vakalar / risk altındaki popülasyon). Incidence rate (insidans hızı), cumulative incidence (kümülatif insidans). Örnek: 'The incidence of breast cancer was 120 per 100,000 women per year.'

**Confounder (Karıştırıcı)**: Hem maruziyetle hem sonuçla ilişkili olan üçüncü değişken. Confounding bias (karıştırma yanlılığı). Kontrol yöntemleri: stratification (tabakalandırma), matching (eşleştirme), multivariate analysis (çok değişkenli analiz), randomization (randomizasyon). Örnek: 'Age acted as a confounder and was controlled for in the analysis.'

**Outcome measures (Sonuç ölçüleri)**: Primary outcome (birincil sonuç), secondary outcome (ikincil sonuç), surrogate outcome (vekil sonuç), clinical endpoint (klinik sonlanım noktası), composite outcome (bileşik sonuç). Örnek: 'The primary outcome was all-cause mortality at 5 years.'

**Ilgili terimler**: attributable risk (atfedilebilir risk), population attributable risk (popülasyon atfedilebilir riski), number needed to treat (NNT - tedavi etme gereksinimi sayısı), hazard ratio (tehlike oranı - survival analizinde).
examples: Individuals with hypertension are at increased risk of stroke. (Risk ifadesi)
The relative risk of heart disease was 1.8 for obese individuals. (Relative risk)
The odds ratio suggested a strong association between smoking and cancer. (Odds ratio)
The prevalence of asthma in children has increased over the past decade. (Prevalence)
The incidence of new HIV infections has declined due to prevention programs. (Incidence)
Age was a potential confounder and was adjusted for in the analysis. (Confounder)
The primary outcome was cardiovascular mortality at 10 years. (Primary outcome)
A composite outcome of death, myocardial infarction, or stroke was used. (Composite outcome)
The odds of disease were 3.2 times higher in exposed individuals. (Odds comparison)
Socioeconomic status confounded the relationship between diet and health. (Confounding)
The number needed to treat was 20, meaning 20 patients must be treated to prevent one event. (NNT)
Hazard ratios were calculated using Cox proportional hazards models. (Hazard ratio)
Point prevalence was assessed on January 1, 2023. (Point prevalence)
Stratification by sex was performed to control for confounding. (Confounding control)
The cumulative incidence over 5 years was 12%. (Cumulative incidence)

exercises.question: Smokers are at a significantly ---- risk of developing lung cancer compared to non-smokers.
exercises.explanation: 'increased risk' = artmış risk. Sigara akciğer kanseri riskini artırır.

exercises.question: The ---- of diabetes in the study population was found to be 9.2%.
exercises.explanation: 'prevalence' belirli anda toplam vaka oranı. Yüzde olarak ifade edilir.

exercises.question: The ---- of new cancer cases was 150 per 100,000 person-years.
exercises.explanation: 'incidence' yeni vaka sayısı. 'per person-years' insidans hızı birimidir.

exercises.question: Age may act as a ---- in the relationship between exercise and heart disease.
exercises.explanation: 'confounder' = karıştırıcı. Hem egzersizle hem kalp hastalığıyla ilişkili olabilir.

exercises.question: The odds ---- indicated a 2.5-fold increased likelihood of disease among exposed individuals.
exercises.explanation: 'odds ratio' case-control çalışmalarda ilişki ölçütü.

exercises.question: The primary ---- of the trial was all-cause mortality at 5 years.
exercises.explanation: 'primary outcome' birincil sonuç. Çalışmanın ana hedefi.

exercises.question: The relative ---- for heart disease was 1.5 in the exposed group.
exercises.explanation: 'relative risk' = rölatif risk. Cohort çalışmalarda kullanılır.

exercises.question: Confounding was controlled ---- by stratifying the analysis by age groups.
exercises.explanation: Hem 'controlled for' hem 'controlled by' doğru. 'controlled for' = kontrol edildi.

exercises.question: The number needed ---- treat was 15, indicating relatively high efficacy.
exercises.explanation: 'number needed to treat (NNT)' sabit ifade. Tedavi etme gereksinimi sayısı.

exercises.question: ---- prevalence was assessed by counting all existing cases on a specific date.
exercises.explanation: 'Point prevalence' belirli bir tarihteki prevalans. Tek zaman noktası.

exercises.question: A composite outcome ---- death, stroke, and myocardial infarction was used.
exercises.explanation: Hepsi doğru: consisting of, composed of, comprising, including - bileşik sonucu tanımlama.

exercises.question: Individuals ---- increased BMI had a higher risk of developing type 2 diabetes.
exercises.explanation: 'individuals with...' = ...olan bireyler. Özellik belirtme.
